member.name: TF_PERSISTENT_PROPERTY_HEADER_ACP
member.summary: The TF_PERSISTENT_PROPERTY_HEADER_ACP structure is used to provide property header data.

member.name: TF_PERSISTENT_PROPERTY_HEADER_ACP.guidType
member.summary: Contains a GUID that identifies the property.

member.name: TF_PERSISTENT_PROPERTY_HEADER_ACP.ichStart
member.summary: Contains the starting character position of the property.

member.name: TF_PERSISTENT_PROPERTY_HEADER_ACP.cch
member.summary: Contains the number of characters that the property spans.

member.name: TF_PERSISTENT_PROPERTY_HEADER_ACP.cb
member.summary: Contains the size, in bytes, of the property value.

member.name: TF_PERSISTENT_PROPERTY_HEADER_ACP.dwPrivate
member.summary: Contains a DWORD value defined by the property owner.

member.name: TF_PERSISTENT_PROPERTY_HEADER_ACP.clsidTIP
member.summary: Contains the CLSID of the property owner.
